title: Activist Says Japanese Founding Families Failing to Boost Shares
description: A London-based activist investor has fired off a series of letters to the directors of two Japanese companies largely owned by their founding families saying they are responsible for share prices at “extremely depressed” levels.
content: A London-based activist investor has fired off a series of letters to the directors of two Japanese companies largely owned by their founding families saying they are responsible for share prices at “extremely depressed” levels.
